actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to exempt from inspection certain small passenger vessels that operate in waters of the United States only in the Virgin Islands.

summary.text: Amends Federal shipping law to exempt from Federal inspection requirements small passenger vessels that carry no more than 12 passengers and operate only in U.S. Virgin Islands waters.

titles.title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to exempt from inspection certain small passenger vessels that operate in waters of the United States only in the Virgin Islands.
